projects.name: Room reservation app - internal project
projects.description: Learning project for reservation conferences rooms in our office in Rzeszów.

projects.name: Maintenance US wireless network operator client app
projects.description: In this project I was part of a few different smaller teams working for a US network operator. I worked in maintenance the client app and in creating internal tools, sdk for Q&A team. Writing Unit test for serialization POJO classes. Replacing written by hand POJO classes with generated classes from JSON Schemas.Creating internal application for Q&A team for testing network connection with server. Creating testing automation framework.

projects.name: App for controlling bluetooth headphones
projects.description:
For one year I was part of a small team which developed an app for Australian startup. This app allowed for controlling intelligent headphones. We work using SCRUM and use Jira for project tracking.  In this project I was responsible for: 
Selection used technologies and frameworks. 
Design UI according to received mockups.
Creating custom views.
Integration firebase and amazon services.
Bug fixing and maintenance app.
Establishing bluetooth connection with headphones.
Code review client developers code, added to app.
Integrating Google Analytics.

projects.name: Creating components for international wireless network operator
projects.description:
For half a year I was part of a team which developed multiple libraries allowing to create apps for multiple countries. We work using SCRUM and we used Jira for project tracking.  In this project I was responsible for: 
Creating UI design for PoC of new component.  
Integrating firebase, and deep-links in a sample app.
Bug fixing.
Extracting part of spanish app to separate component.
Moving networking from new component to separate component.
Create a new sample app using dependency injection (Koin). 
Migrate project from github to github enterprise.

projects.name: Maintenance apps developed as a part of standalone intelligent screen
projects.description:
For half a year I was part of a team which developed multiple apps, libraries for an intelligent screen device. We work using SCRUM and we used Phabricator for project tracking.  In this project I was responsible for: 
Bug fixing and optimization UI, custom views and custom layouts. 
Create multiple themes for UI (dark and light).
Implement UI changes from design

projects.name: Develop app for managing retail network
projects.description:
For one year I was part of a team which developed and maintained an app which allowed managing shop networks. Application allowed assigned tasks to employees and verified it with photos , sent marketing material and information. The app was modularized and can be customized for different companies.  In this project I was responsible for: 
Creation of new functionalities and development of the existing ones.
Establish a camera support inside the application.
Support for push notifications
Optimization and application maintenance
App releasing 
Writing unit tests 
Migration from Dagger to Koin

projects.name: Maintenance eyesight testing app
projects.description:
Now I’m working on a maintenance app which is used in healthcare. I have been working here for 3 months and I’ve responsible for :
Bug fixing 
Migration app from Java to Kotlin 
Modernize app 
Code refactor and clean up
Fixing Sonar warnings
